alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:36PM CDT until July 16 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 436 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jonesville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jonesville and Wallace Ridge around 445 PM CDT. Wildsville around 450 PM CDT. Frogmore around 505 PM CDT. Ferriday around 520 PM CDT. Ridgecrest around 525 PM CDT. Vidalia around 535 PM CDT. Natchez around 540 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
